<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

 var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther', 'numDerivedGenotype', 'numMicroarrayData', 'numSquenceData', 'numSomaticSnv', 'numArrayCgh','numWholeGenome', 'numWholeExome', 'numTargetGenome', 'numTargetedExome', 'numWholeTranscriptome', 'numTargetedTranscriptome', 'numEpigenomic', 'numSanger', 'numRrna']; 
    
    var variables={};
    var email = request.queryParams.email;
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
    gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", email);
    gr.orderBy("order");
    gr.query();
	
	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	var jsonArr = [];
	jsonArr.push({
		itemId: variables
	});
	
	return jsonArr;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/getGDSPVariableIdArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getGDSPVariableIdArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-14 16:33:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getGDSPVariableIdArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3b2b127adb8efa0054d8ff621f9619c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-21 21:05:01</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:60, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'visible'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 250}, 1: {columnWidth: 280}}}); } function addTableToPdf1(doc, data, height){ console.log(data); var res = doc.autoTableHtmlToJson(data); doc.autoTable(res.columns, res.data, {startX:60, startY: height, headerStyles:{fillColor: [204, 204, 204], textColor: [0, 0, 25]}, styles:{overflow: 'linebreak', columnWidth: 'wrap'}, columnStyles: { 0: {columnWidth: 50}, 1: {columnWidth: 100}, 2: {columnWidth: 60}, 3: {columnWidth: 250}, 4: {columnWidth: 70}}}); } function parse(allcomments) { var comments = allcomments.split("ENDCOMMENTS"); var commentsblock = 'RoleApproverApproval StatusCommentsTime' for(i = 0; i < comments .length; i++){ if (comments[i].length > 40) { if (comments[i][0] == '\n') { var lastI = 0; while (lastI < comments[i].length && comments[i][lastI] == '\n') lastI ++; comments[i] = comments[i].substring(lastI,comments[i].length); } var t = comments[i].substring(0,22); t = t.replace(/([\\n])/g, ''); var approver = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')+9,comments[i].length); var results = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 59,comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 67); var comm= comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(Additional comments)') + 68, comments[i].indexOf('(role)')); var role = comments[i].substring(comments[i].indexOf('(role)') + 6, comments[i].indexOf('(ENDROLE)')); commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + role + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + approver + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + results+ ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + comm + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + "" + t + ""; commentsblock = commentsblock + ""; } } return commentsblock; } function loadApprovalData(data){ for(key in data){ var value = getValue(key, data[key]); $('#'+key+"2").html(value); $('#'+key+"1").html(value); } } function getValue(name, value){ if(textFields.indexOf(name) != -1 ){ if(name == 'date'){ return getConvertedValue(value, '1'); }else{ return value; } }else{ if(value == "true"){ return ''; }else{ return ''; } } } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(flag == '0'){ var values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { var values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } }]]>csp_instanceThis is the report page for GDSP applicationfalsegdps-report-page-contentfalseGDSP Report Page Contentfalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-20 15:26:26true01160574db12720054d8ff621f96192a203GDSP Report Page Contentglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_01160574db12720054d8ff621f96192azhoujim@nih.gov2017-06-21 20:48:45

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
 var names=['investigator','email','phone', 'date', 'projectNumber', 'projectName', 'simpleSize','prospective', 'restrospective', 'human', 'nonHuman', 'germLine','somatic', 'dnaType', 'rnaType',  'microbiome', 'mitochrondria', 'otherType', 'specifyOtherType', 'snpArrayData', 'numSNP', 'expressionArray', 'numExpression','methylationArray', 'numMethylation','arrayDerive', 'microarrayData', 'sequenceData', 'somaticSnv', 'arrayCgh', 'wholeGenome', 'wholeExome', 'targetGenome', 'targetExome', 'wholeTranscriptome', 'targetTrabscriptome', 'epigenomicMark', 'sanger', 'rrna', 'association', 'arrayDerivedExpression', 'rnaExpression', 'derivedMethylation', 'otherAnalysis', 'spcifiedOtherAnalysis', 'individual', 'aggregate', 'notApplicableDataForm', 'arrayExpress', 'cancerGenomics', 'clinVar', 'dbGap', 'dbSnp', 'dbVar', 'ena', 'genBank', 'geo', 'mgi', 'sra', 'traceArchive', 'wormbase', 'zfin', 'OtherRepository', 'specifiedRepository','phenotype', 'exposure', 'clinicalData', 'specifiedClinicalData', 'protocol', 'specifiedProtocol', 'instrument', 'specifiedInstrument', 'surveyTool', 'otherCompanion', 'specifiedCompanion', 'dataCheck', 'publication', 'otherSubmission', 'psecifiedOtherSubmission', 'noHumanData', 'noLimitation','limitedOnly', 'limitedPurpose','relateToDisease','orginId', 'version','rat', 'mouse', 'celegans', 'drosophila', 'yeast', 'yeastSpecies', 'bacteria', 'bacteriaSpecies','noHumanOther', 'numDerivedGenotype', 'numMicroarrayData', 'numSquenceData', 'numSomaticSnv', 'numArrayCgh','numWholeGenome', 'numWholeExome', 'numTargetGenome', 'numTargetedExome', 'numWholeTranscriptome', 'numTargetedTranscriptome', 'numEpigenomic', 'numSanger', 'numRrna'];    
	var jsonData = [];
	var data = request.body.data;
	var requested_for = data.requested_for;
	var opened_by = data.opened_by;
	var cat_item = data.cat_item;
	var short_description = data.short_description;
	var itemIds = data.variables;
	var contactType = data.contact_type;
	var investigator= data.investigator;
	var projectName= data.projectName;
	var resubmit = data.resubmit;
	var comments = data.comments;

	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
	gr_request.initialize();
	gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.requested_for = requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = opened_by;
	gr_request.contact_type = contactType;
	var request_id = gr_request.insert();

	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item.initialize();
	gr_requested_item.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_requested_item.cat_item = cat_item;
	gr_requested_item.short_description = short_description;
	gr_requested_item.request = request_id;
	gr_requested_item.contact_type = contactType;
	gr_requested_item.u_investigator = investigator;
	gr_requested_item.u_project_name = projectName;

	if(resubmit == 'true'){
		gr_requested_item.comments = comments;
	  }

	var submitted_id = gr_requested_item.insert();
	var number = gr_requested_item.number;

	for (x=0; x<names.length; x++) {
		var gr_answers = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
		gr_answers.initialize();
		gr_answers.item_option_new = itemIds[names[x]];
		gr_answers.value = data[names[x]];
		gr_answers.order = x+1;
		var answers_sys_id = gr_answers.insert();

		var gr_m2m = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option_mtom');
		gr_m2m.initialize();
		gr_m2m.sc_item_option = answers_sys_id;
		gr_m2m.request_item = submitted_id;
		gr_m2m.insert();
	  }

	var gr_requested_item2 = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
	gr_requested_item2.get(submitted_id);
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
	gr_requested_item2.due_date = gdt.getDisplayValue();
	gr_requested_item2.update();
	
	//get project ticket number
	var orginId = '';
	var tickerNum = '';
	var org_ticket_num = '';
	var version = '';
	var hasParent = '';
	var selectedOrginId = '';

	selectedOrginId = contactType;
	if(selectedOrginId == '' || selectedOrginId === undefined || selectedOrginId == 'Web' ){
		orginId = submitted_id;
		org_ticket_num = number;
		hasParent = 'false';
	}else{
		var orgIds = selectedOrginId.split("=");
		var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
		gr_tracking_item.query();

		if(gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
			gr_tracking_item.next();
			orginId = gr_tracking_item.u_orgid;
			org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number;
			version = orgIds[1];
			hasParent = 'true';
		}else {
			orginId = submitted_id;
			org_ticket_num = number;
			hasParent = 'false';
		}
	}
	var ticket_number = '';
	if(hasParent == 'true'){
		ticket_number = 'CCR_GDSP' + org_ticket_num.substring(8) + '-' + version;
	}else{
		ticket_number = "CCR_GDSP" + gr_approval_items.sysapproval.number.substring(8);
	}	
	
	jsonData.push({
		id: submitted_id,
		number: number,
		ticketNum: ticket_number
	});
	
	return jsonData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/gdspapi/submitRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 20:32:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_16e846e2db8aba00f59974131f9619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-21 21:05:37</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="gdspAPI">212601dedb4e7a00f59974131f961986</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

$('#relateToDisease').removeAttr("disabled"); } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "u_gdsp_user_submission", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalsegdsp-saved-tablefalseGDSP Saved Tablefalsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2017-04-11 15:29:06truea970b6f5db0e7a0054d8ff621f96194c72GDSP Saved Tableglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_a970b6f5db0e7a0054d8ff621f96194czhoujim@nih.gov2017-06-21 21:01:15

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=b59325ff6f3416000a09334abb3ee4dd^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="GDSP Service" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="b59325ff6f3416000a09334abb3ee4dd"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CCR_GDSP_Withdraw_Submission</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var contact_type = '';
var ticketNum = '';
var version = '';
var hasParent = '';
var org_ticket_num = '';
var variables;
var current_obj = null;
    
contact_type = current.getValue('contact_type');

if(contact_type == '' || contact_type === undefined || contact_type == 'Web'){
   org_ticket_num = current.number;
   hasParent = 'false';
}else{
	var orgIds = contact_type.split("=");
    var gr_tracking_item = GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
    gr_tracking_item.addQuery('u_orgid',orgIds[0]);
    gr_tracking_item.query();
    if(gr_tracking_item.getRowCount() > 0){
        gr_tracking_item.next();
   	 currentobj = gr_tracking_item;
        org_ticket_num = gr_tracking_item.u_ticket_number;
        version = orgIds[1];
        hasParent = 'true';
    }		
}

if(hasParent == 'true'){
    ticketNum = 'CCR_GDSP' + org_ticket_num.substring(8) + '-' + version;
}else{
    ticketNum = 'CCR_GDSP' + org_ticket_num.substring(8);
} 	

var gr_withdraw = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_gdsp_withdraw');
gr_withdraw.initialize();
gr_withdraw.u_gdsp_id = ticketNum;
gr_withdraw.insert();


gs.eventQueue('sc_req_item.withdraw', gr_withdraw);
//gs.eventQueue('sc_req_item.withdraw', current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
gs.logWarning('sc_req_item.withdraw event triggerred');]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wuye@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-04-11 14:36:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>3408bed86fb2d2000a09034abb3ee4b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CCR_GDSP_Withdraw_Submission</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package/><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3408bed86fb2d2000a09034abb3ee4b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wuye@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-21 21:30:34</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
